value:
Hilda...I will never forgive the things
you did to Mother!

I don't think my uncle, Bloom, or my
cousins, Ishtar and Ishtore, were ever
truly bad people...

My cousins, Ishtore and Ishtar, were
always very kind to me. I don't
believe they really wanted to fight.

I... I will fight if I must. I'll do it to
avenge my mother's death!

This pendant is a cherished memento
of my mother.

My name is Tine... I've come on
behalf of $Nf.
Mother... Help me to be strong too!

I do not wish to fight, but I will do so
to protect what's right.
I-I'm sorry...

Mother, watch over me. I will make
sure Hilda is punished!

I am Tine. I know I can fight, if that is
what you wish of me.

I don't have many memories of my
mother, but I remember that she
always seemed sad.$k$pI didn't realize how terribly Hilda was
treating her... But that's no excuse.$k$pWhen was I reunited with my brother,
Arthur, I felt ashamed. Mother had
protected me while she suffered.$k$pStill, I don't believe that my cousins,
Ishtore and Ishtar, were ever false in
their kindness to me.$k$pEven now, there are times I don't
know what to do. How do I know
what's right? Do you know?
やっ
たあっ
きゃあっ
そんな…！
Forgive me!
Please stop this!
I do not want to fight.
If this is what you wish...
Mother... I'll see you again.
Hehe...
I'm Tine. Have you met Arthur? He's my brother.
Huh? You must have me confused with someone else.
Friege may be my home, but I don't feel any fondness for it. Maybe that will change someday.
Hilda held a grudge against my mother. And now my mother is dead.
This pendant? It's a memento. I carry it always.
Mother, watch over me. I will make Hilda regret what she did to us!
I wish I could have met you sooner.
I will.
What do you need?
Watch over me.
